title: Cebuana Lhuillier Jewelry
description: A comprehensive and ongoing full-stack e-commerce platform designed specifically for the jewelry industry. Beyond standard product listings, it features dynamic inventory management, secure checkout, and customer engagement tools, all powered by WooCommerce on the backend. The frontend is developed with Next.js, providing lightning-fast performance, SEO optimization, and a fully responsive, mobile-first design. One of the standout features of the platform is its integration with Camweara, enabling customers to virtually try on jewelry pieces in real-time using augmented reality. This creates a highly interactive and personalized shopping experience that bridges the gap between physical and online retail. The project is built with scalability in mind, ensuring it can grow alongside the business while delivering a seamless and luxurious digital storefront experience.

title: DIGICON DMAP 2025
description: Public-facing informational website for DMAP 2025 where users can register for the event. Built with a modern headless setup.

title: DIGICON DMAP 2024 - Registration
description: Public-facing informational website for DMAP 2025 where users can register for the event. Built with a modern headless setup.

title: Project Management Information System
description: Developed for DOST-SEI to manage department line-item budgets with varying formats. Generates reports for congressional submission, schedules activities, and provides real-time approval workflows.

title: Biometrics Summary System
description: Built an in-house system for Philippine Investment that processes CLSX/CSV biometrics files to generate attendance reports. Includes editing for official business and leave tracking.

title: BIAS
description: Experimental live streaming platform with interactive features, AWS IVS integration, and Xendit payments. Project discontinued.

title: Maintenance Projects
description: Handled ongoing maintenance, feature updates, and reskins for various client websites and systems.

title: Modules & Pages
description: Contributed specific modules and pages to larger projects, often enhancing functionality or delivering custom UI sections.
